all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
But purify your hearts before me; and then go ye into all the world, and preach my gospel unto every creature who has not received it;
Doctrine and Covenants 112:28
Quote of the Day
"As disciples, when we make and keep sacred covenants, we are blessed with spiritual power."
Elder John A. McCune | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
